page.title: 03Arbroath housing.
page.content: In our "D" block there is a wide variety of housing, privately-owned and many types of council houses.There are small houses specially for old-aged pensioners and single people, there are semi-detached and terraced houses but no multi-storeyed flats as Arbroath is such a small town. One of the very interesting projects that is taking place is that the council is renovating old houses in the centre of the town instead of just building further and further out. This means that the character of the centre of Arbroath is being retained and people are being kept nearer to the shops, etc. The houses that we looked at beside the library were very nice indeed.
